headline: Dangerous Honesty
description: A personal and imperfect reckoning with ideological nuance, moral framing, and the difficulty of representing arguments fairly without disclaiming the obvious. Aesthetic analysis collapses into an existential stance.
whyItMatters: Because it refuses to disclaim the obvious for safety. It acknowledges contradiction but reclaims moral clarity through sincerity, not hedging.
articleExcerpt: I will not couch this in the speak of fear. I mean what I say.
sourceFragments: I should have been more vociferous in my denouncement but even this note makes me wonder, why it is needed?
Wouldn’t you assume that to be the case? SO I take it back.
